item.description:
Our most recent outing, kayaking, was so much fun, let's do it again. Weather permitting let's get together at Charles River Canoe and Kayak . Friday July 6, 2007 is the date. 7:00 pm would be a good time to meet. It's very reasonably priced, $14-16 per hour for a single kayak. If there are more than 8 people we can get a 20% discount.



Reservations are available for groups renting eight or more boats. Discounted rates for groups renting eight or more boats are available during off-peak hours, and peak-hour group reservations are available with a reservation fee. Examine our policy below, and please call or e-mail us to request a quote or ask questions.


Reservations are Required
Call (617) 965-5110, Monday-Friday 10am-5pm, to Reserve


Discounted Group Rates (not valid noon-5pm on weekends & holidays)
For groups renting eight or more boats, we offer a 20% discount off our regular rental rates. No discounts are offered on kids kayaks.
Customized instruction is available for $120/hour or $500/day per instructor.
One person must pay for all boats and instruction at the same time.
A $50 deposit is required for groups renting 10 or more boats.
No discounts are offered during our peak hours of noon to 5pm on weekends and holidays, though you can still reserve boats. See our Peak Hour policy below.
special rates for school groups (K-12) and camps:
when renting 8-9 boats: 20% off regular rates (except kids kayaks)
when renting 10-14 boats: 40% off regular rates (except kids kayaks)
when renting 15 or more boats: 50% off regular rates (except kids kayaks)
customized instruction is available for $75/hour or $400/day per instructor


Peak-Hour Reservation Fee (noon-5pm on weekends & holidays)
Peak-hour reservations are available for groups renting eight or more boats. We require pre-payment of a reservation fee of $10/boat plus a deposit equal to one hour of rental for each reserved boat.
No discounts are available during peak hours.


Cancellation Policy
Group reservations cancelled with at least 24 hours notice will receive a refund of their deposit less a $15 registration fee.
For cancellations with less than 24 hours notice, no refunds or credits will be issued.
Cancellations made due to weather must be made before 5pm the night before the event; customers will receive a refund of their deposit less a $15 registration fee.
